title: Ep 320 | Jep Robertson's Early Marriage Struggles and an Adoption Stat That Will Make Your Jaw Drop
description:
Jep, Jase, and Zach tell Phil why adoption is one of the greatest manifestations of the Gospel in their lives and how it's strengthened their relationships with God. Phil explains why it's the responsibility of God’s people to care for others and why the government can’t handle it. Phil and Zach discuss why the Gospel is a paradox. Jep shares some eye-opening stats about adoption and talks about his first year of marriage to Jessica. And Jase talks about how love must be sincere, or it isn't true.
